text: Klara Höfels (1949 – 15 May 2022) was a German actress, director and theatre producer. She was first a stage actress who worked for Schauspiel Frankfurt, Residenztheater in Munich and Staatstheater Stuttgart. She later became known for roles in television series such as SOKO and Hinter Gittern – Der Frauenknast. Höfels was born in Grevenbroich, North Rhine-Westphalia, West Germany. She played Irma in the 2016 movie Toni Erdmann. Höfels died on 15 May 2022 in Berlin, Germany at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German movie actors Category:German stage actors Category:German theatre directors Category:Theatre producers Category:Actors from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:German television actors
title: Klara Höfels
